\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{

}}

\newcommand{\otttyp}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{typ}  ,\ \ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{D}  ,\ \mathsf{Char}  ,\ \mathsf{Bool}}{::=}{\ottcom{types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Int} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{int}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Top} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{top type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Bot} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bottom type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{intersection}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{union}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \Diamond  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottmode}{
\ottrulehead{\Diamond}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ < }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ > }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \overline{ \Diamond } } {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\otttyp\ottinterrule
\ottmode\ottafterlastrule

% defnss
% defns OSubtyping
%% defn osub
\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXrefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_refl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXtrans}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}   \Diamond   \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_trans}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \Diamond  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXarr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}    \overline{ \Diamond }    \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{C}   \Diamond   \ottnt{D} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C}   \Diamond   \ottnt{B}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_arr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXand}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{B} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{C}  \ottsym{]} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_and}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXandl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{]}   \Diamond   \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_andl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXandr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{]}   \Diamond   \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_andr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{C} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}   \Diamond   \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A} \,  \overline{ \Diamond }  \, \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{]}   \Diamond   \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_or}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXorl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A} \,  \overline{ \Diamond }  \, \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{]} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_orl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXorr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{B}   \Diamond   \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A} \,  \overline{ \Diamond }  \, \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{]} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_orr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXdistArr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{)}  \, \& \,  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C}  \ottsym{)}    <    \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_distArr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXdistArrU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C}  \ottsym{)}  \, \& \,  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{B}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C}  \ottsym{)}    <    \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_distArrU}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXdistOr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{)}  \, \& \,  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{)}    <    \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_distOr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOSXXflip}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}    \overline{ \Diamond }    \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OS\_flip}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnosub}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{A}   \Diamond   \ottnt{B} $}{\ottcom{Original BCD Declarative Subtyping - Top-Like + Unions}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXrefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXtrans{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXarr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXand{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXandl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXandr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXorl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXorr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXdistArr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXdistArrU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXdistOr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOSXXflip{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsOSubtyping}{
\ottdefnosub{}}

% defns OrdinaryType
%% defn ord
\newcommand{\ottdruleOXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Top}  ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }{%
{\ottdrulename{O\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOXXbot}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Bot}  ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }{%
{\ottdrulename{O\_bot}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Int}  ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }{%
{\ottdrulename{O\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }{%
{\ottdrulename{O\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOXXor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }{%
{\ottdrulename{O\_or}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnord}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} $}{\ottcom{Ordinary Types}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOXXbot{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOXXor{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn ordu
\newcommand{\ottdruleOUXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Top}  ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OU\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOUXXbot}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Bot}  ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OU\_bot}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOUXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Int}  ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OU\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOUXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OU\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOUXXand}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }{%
{\ottdrulename{OU\_and}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnordu}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} $}{\ottcom{Ordinary Types (for unions)}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOUXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOUXXbot{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOUXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOUXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOUXXand{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsOrdinaryType}{
\ottdefnord{}\ottdefnordu{}}

% defns SplitType
%% defn spl
\newcommand{\ottdruleSpXXand}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Sp\_and}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSpXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{C}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{D} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Sp\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSpXXarrowUnion}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{D} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{B}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{C}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Sp\_arrowUnion}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSpXXorl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Sp\_orl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSpXXorr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Sp\_orr}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnspl}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{C} $}{\ottcom{Splittable Types}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpXXand{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpXXarrowUnion{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpXXorl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpXXorr{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn splu
\newcommand{\ottdruleSpUXXor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SpU\_or}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSpUXXandl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SpU\_andl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSpUXXandr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A} ~\mathsf{OrdinaryU} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{A}  \, \& \,  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SpU\_andr}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsplu}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\LHD}  \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\RHD}  \ottnt{C} $}{\ottcom{Split Union Types}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpUXXor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpUXXandl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSpUXXandr{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsSplitType}{
\ottdefnspl{}\ottdefnsplu{}}

% defns Subtyping
%% defn sub
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \mathsf{Int}   : \Diamond :   \mathsf{Int}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  : \Diamond :  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \Diamond  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXbot}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}   \overline{ \Diamond }   \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  : \Diamond :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_bot}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXandl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{C} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{D}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{D}  :  <  :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_andl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXandr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{C} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{D}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  :  <  :  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{D}  :  <  :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_andr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{D} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  :  <  :  \ottnt{D} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{B}  :  <  :  \ottnt{D} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_or}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXorl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{C} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{B}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_orl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXorr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{C} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{B}  \, \mid \,  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_orr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXarr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D} ~\mathsf{Ordinary} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  \overline{ \Diamond }  :  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{C}  : \Diamond :  \ottnt{D} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{C}  : \Diamond :  \ottnt{B}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{D} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_arr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXand}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{B}  \mathbin{\lhd}  \ottnt{D}  \mathbin{\rhd}  \ottnt{C} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  :  <  :  \ottnt{D} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_and}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsub}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{A}  : \Diamond :  \ottnt{B} $}{\ottcom{Algorithmic Subtyping}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXbot{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXandl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXandr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXorl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXorr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXarr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXand{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsSubtyping}{
\ottdefnsub{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsOSubtyping
\ottdefnsOrdinaryType
\ottdefnsSplitType
\ottdefnsSubtyping
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
